title: Ep. 107: Saving the Everglades
itunes:title: Ep. 107: Saving the Everglades
description:
Fort Lauderdale, FL- Steven Rinella talks with Kellie Ralston and Matt Cook, along with Janis Putelis of the MeatEater crew.

Subjects Discussed: the American Sportfishing Association; Florida: the most fishinest state; the Magnusson-Stevens Act; the state of America's major fisheries; restoring the Everglades; Florida's access issues; how to save our coral reefs; keeping America fishing; the mechanical awesomeness of a largemouth bass's big-assed mouth; and more.

 

Connect with Steve and MeatEater

MeatEater on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube
